ecosystem_insights.title: COMPLEMENTARY_ACTIVITIES: Metalcommerce D.O.O, Steel Impex DOO

ecosystem_insights.title: [CAPABILITY-NEED GAPS] Recycling Infrastructure Access Gap
ecosystem_insights.description: There is a significant need for recycling infrastructure access, but only a limited number of entities provide this capability. This gap could hinder the effective processing and management of waste materials.

ecosystem_insights.title: [VALUE CHAIN GAPS] Weakness in Waste-to-Resource Conversion
ecosystem_insights.description: The ecosystem has limited capabilities for converting waste into valuable resources, which is a critical stage in the circular economy value chain. This could lead to inefficiencies and missed opportunities for resource recovery.

ecosystem_insights.title: [ROLE DISTRIBUTION GAPS] Underrepresented Research Institutes and Funding Bodies
ecosystem_insights.description: Research institutes and funding bodies are underrepresented in the ecosystem, which could limit innovation and financial support for circular economy initiatives.

ecosystem_insights.title: [GEOGRAPHIC GAPS] Uneven Geographic Distribution of CE Actors
ecosystem_insights.description: The ecosystem has a high concentration in certain areas but lacks presence in others, which could limit the accessibility and reach of circular economy activities.

ecosystem_insights.title: [ACTIVITY COVERAGE GAPS] Lack of Sharing Platforms and Take-back Schemes
ecosystem_insights.description: The ecosystem lacks activities related to sharing platforms and take-back schemes, which are important for extending the lifecycle of products through reuse.

ecosystem_insights.title: [MEDIUM] Develop a funding program specifically for circular economy
ecosystem_insights.description:
Develop a funding program specifically for circular economy projects to attract more investment from Funding Bodies.

Expected Impact: Increase financial support and encourage the development of new circular economy initiatives.

ecosystem_insights.title: [MEDIUM] Expand geographic coverage by establishing CE hubs in areas
ecosystem_insights.description:
Expand geographic coverage by establishing CE hubs in areas with no current presence to improve accessibility and reach.

Target: Public Authorities, Industry Partners

Expected Impact: Enhance the overall distribution of circular economy activities across different regions.

ecosystem_insights.description:
